channel.title: {URGENT} [PI] How to add dragon claws - server sided [PI] {URGENT}
channel.description: Hmm, I can wear it but it says "unarmed" on the combat tab. I also edited the stats but it's still all 0, Help please??

item.title: {URGENT} [PI] How to add dragon claws - server sided [PI] {URGENT}
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

mr pker01:

Hmm, I can wear it but it says “unarmed” on the combat tab. I also edited the stats but it’s still all 0, Help please??

Hmmm you must have messed up somewhere in the ints. And also, why does everyone put words in brackets? Mod L you aren’t a mod.

Read full topic
item.source: {URGENT} [PI] How to add dragon claws - server sided [PI] {URGENT}

item.title: {URGENT} [PI] How to add dragon claws - server sided [PI] {URGENT}
item.dc:creator: @Mod_L Mod L
item.description:
@Mod_L wrote:

first you should add the ints at itemdef.java (client files), add the gzipped model, add the stats and items.cfg, and i think you need to edit config.java ,in the weapon section slot add word CLAWS.

Read full topic
